content.title: Sensitive sandstone
content.description: Sandstone is especially sensitive to water and temperature changes. Avoid wet conditions and extreme temperatures. Ignoring these warnings can lead to irreversible damage to the rock.
content.tips:
- Don't climb in wet conditions.
- Brush your holds.
- Respect the weather conditions.

content.title: Leave no trace
content.description: Leave no trace means leaving the area as you found it. Don't leave any litter, don't leave any marks on the rock, don't leave any traces of your presence.
content.tips:
- Take your trash with you.
- Don't leave any litter.
- Don't leave any marks on the rock.
- Don't leave any traces of your presence.
- Follow marked paths.

content.title: Protect the vegetation
content.description: Follow the marked paths to avoid damaging the vegetation and to avoid getting lost. All the revenue made by the park is used to maintain the paths and the vegetation.
content.tips:
- Follow the marked paths.
- Don't create new paths.
- Don't damage the vegetation.

content.title: Respect wildlife
content.description: Respect the wildlife and the environment. Don't feed the animals, don't disturb the animals, don't damage the environment.
content.tips:
- Don't feed the animals.
- Don't disturb the animals.
- Don't damage the environment.
